column4: I'm trying to get rox file manager to run right, but it's asking for pk-gtk-module, wich I can't seem to find.
odd.. rox works here.. the pinboard feature dont work.. but thefile managert does
right the Pinboard feature of ROX filer that does the desktop icons doesent workhere.. or in 10.04 ive noticed
